content: Singaporean professional golfer **Lam Chih Bing** (born 29 December 1976) is a Singaporean former [professional golfer](/wiki/Professional_golfer). ## Career Lam was a scratch golfer at seventeen, and attended the [University of Arizona](/wiki/University_of_Arizona) in the United States before completing an MBA at the [University of Leicester](/wiki/University_of_Leicester) in England, following his ambition to become a [fund manager](/wiki/Fund_manager). Instead he began a professional golf career, joining the [Asian Tour](/wiki/Asian_Tour) in 2001. In his first seven seasons Lam struggled to retain his card, never finishing inside the top 60 on the Order of Merit, but 2008 was his breakthrough year, with four top-10s and a maiden tour win at the prestigious season-ending [Volvo Masters of Asia](/wiki/Volvo_Masters_of_Asia). ## Professional wins (10) ### Asian Tour wins (1) No.DateTournamentWinning scoreMargin of victoryRunner-up121 Dec (/wiki/2008_Asian_Tour)[Volvo Masters of Asia](/wiki/Volvo_Masters_of_Asia)−14 (69-66-72-67=274)2 strokes [Chapchai Nirat](/wiki/Chapchai_Nirat) ### Professional Golf Tour of India wins (1) No.DateTournamentWinning scoreMargin of victoryRunner-up121 Oct (/wiki/2007%E2%80%9308_Professional_Golf_Tour_of_India)BILT Open−13 (68-66-69-72=275)1 stroke [Digvijay Singh](/wiki/Digvijay_Singh_(golfer)) ### All Thailand Golf Tour wins (1) -
